alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Geauga, Lake and southwestern Ashtabula Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Painesville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, Perry, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Austinburg, Montville, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, North Perry, Thompson, Kirtland Hills, Rock Creek, Grand River and Plymouth Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
